column3: Department of Social and Policy Sciences
column5: Gain the skills and understanding to tackle the global challenges of poverty, inequality, conflict, sustainability and social justice.If you are interested in studying the part-time version of this course, please visit our website.Learn what it means to be a global citizen and gain the skills and tools to make a difference in the world.Whether you’re aiming to further your career as an international development professional or looking to start working in this field, our International Development master’s courses could be for you.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
